parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The timestamp that specifies the end of the time range to query. By default, the value is the time when the GetResourceConfigurationTimeline operation is called.

parameters.name: Limit
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page. Valid values: 1 to 100. Default value: 10.

parameters.name: MemberId
parameters.description: This parameter is scheduled to be removed before 00:00:00, June 30, 2021. Account group-related APIs will be provided as an alternative before 00:00:00, May 30, 2021. If you are using this parameter, we recommend that you switch to account group-related APIs after 00:00:00, May 30, 2021. For more information, see [Account groups](~~211534~~).

parameters.name: MultiAccount
parameters.description: This parameter is scheduled to be removed before 00:00:00, June 30, 2021. Account group-related APIs will be provided as an alternative before 00:00:00, May 30, 2021. If you are using this parameter, we recommend that you switch to account group-related APIs after 00:00:00, May 30, 2021. For more information, see [Account groups](~~211534~~).

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description: The token that is used to start the next query.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The timestamp that specifies the beginning of the time range to query. By default, Cloud Config retrieves the configuration changes in the last 30 days for the specified resource.
